message: can i control internet wifi connections and generate both IP addresses and passwords using arduino ? if not what other kits can i use ??? any help please :D

data.message:
I guess the question is wrong.
but if you want to have more control over the WiFi bandwidth, access and these stuff, then you need a real router, or a server that do the job for you, maybe a "mikrotik" with "arduino" could do what you want.
i want to control only the access of any phone or laptop to a real internet router but with a kit which can control any other circuit ...

Looks like a XY problem*.
What do you _really_ want to accomplish?

[*] http://meta.stackexchange.com/a/66378
I think the question is clear i want a kit that i can use to make a system in which i can generate ip addresses and passwords for amultiple users at the same time to have an internet access

Why not use a stock hotspot and have the Arduino or whatever connect to it and use the admin console (e.g. TELNET if available, or at worst use the HTTP administration page).

You should really read about the XY Problem. The question might be clear but your intent and your details aren't.
I don't want to discuss my project in detail i just want to qsk about something that doesn't mean that i have xy problem
